## layouts.Api.remove() method

Removes a layout matter item from a matter.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
remove(request: layouts.RemoveLayoutMatterItemRequest): Promise<LayoutMatter>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  request | [layouts.RemoveLayoutMatterItemRequest](./smokeball-client-sdk.layouts.removelayoutmatteritemrequest.md) | the update request. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[LayoutMatter](./smokeball-client-sdk.layouts.layoutmatter.md)<!-- -->&gt;

## Example


```
const request: RemoveLayoutMatterItemRequest = {
  itemId: 'f6dd87bf-0266-40cf-b256-fdbc3ffbac66',
  parentItemId: '7250a634-4d67-4054-8f07-5b6c8a9dcfa8',
};
const layout = await sdk.layouts.remove(request);
```
